channel.title: [317]I added new item to item.cfg and compile no errors, run source I get errors
channel.description:
I added a few items to item.cfg and do all the stuff to add them to client, compile client and server works fine. But when I run the server after a moment it shows this then nulls...
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:119)[/code]

item.title: [317]I added new item to item.cfg and compile no errors, run source I get errors
item.dc:creator: @illslayu illslayu
item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

Iv’e also had a problem with item.cfg.
If you KNOW that you changed one “It3m” into “Item” (or more) then try changing it back.
The problem above has happened to me once. And when i changed it back to “It3m” it worked fine agin. Sorta weird tho.

Read full topic

You have put something invalid in, check over everything you added.
